review: Dr. Ritu Garg, she is not only a doctor for me.. infact, she is just my second mother becase the way she talks and treat, just remind me my mother. She treats me from starting of my pregnancy and its my last month now.. i love my journey with her.

dr ritu is the lady whom i respect most after my mother...she is so understanding and caring jst as my mother does...the whole 9 mnth journey of my pregnancy was very difficult for me bt the way she treated me was jstvthe same my mother treats me....i will be forever thankful to her for giving ne my little bundle of joy...and will pray to god  the she get all sucess in her lyf and fly high...i luv u mam....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It's an amazing experience with Ritu ma'am during complete 9 months. From beginning till delivery even after. Such a sweet nature, very much supportive, always available for her patients. I wish God bless her with never ending success n prosperity in her life. Smile from her face n happiness in her life remains forever. üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The Doctor elaborated the medicines , clear and specific communications for all our queries, 
Understood all family history . Had eye for detail for all the reports . 
For some queries she also helped on call .
I really appreciate her for extended support

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Overall best experience with Dr. Ritu mam.... She has very friendly nature Excellent and highly recommended üëçüèª

review:
Just amazing personality.truly, she treats and guides her patient as a daughter that makes her a very humble, cooperative and magnetic gynaecologist. She prescribes limited, ********* *** ********* medicines and tests.
Thank you Dr Ritu ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Ritu mam behavior like friendly, My marriage time period about 4years, but my wife not getting pregnant, then we meet dr. Ritu mam, then my wife getting pregnant in some month after ritu mam supervision, ** **** *** ** **** * *** ** *** 
Thanks mam. üôèüôè
I visited her for Pregnancy Consultation for my wife. Dr. Ritu is not only a very good doctor but also a very good human being.
